DOC.brief_summary: To compare clinical safety & efficacy fixed-high potent statin therapy ( accord 2013 ACC/AHA guideline ) vs. target LDL-C goal statin therapy ( LDL < 70mg/dL ) secondary prevention . Total 4400 patient coronary artery disease patient require statin treatment categorize fix high-potent statin group target LDL-C group . The investigator compare primary endpoint ( major adverse cardiac cerebrovascular event ( MACCE ) ) secondary endpoint ( 1 . New onset diabetes mellitus randomization , 2 . Hospitalization due heart failure , 3 . Deep vein thrombosis Pulmonary thromboembolism , 4 . Percutaneous trans-luminal angioplasty peripheral artery obstructive disease , 5 . Aortic intervention operation , 6 . ESRD renal replacement therapy ) .
DOC.brief_title: Comparing Intensity-based Statin Therapy With Attained Low-density Lipoprotein Cholesterol Based Statin Therapy Patients With Coronary Artery Disease : Statin Strategy Proposal Trial
